text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria greenwelliae, the Kauai wild coffee, is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to the islands of Kauai and Oahu in Hawaii. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998.  Psychotria greenwelliae.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 23 August 2007.
